short_summary: Vehicle eat, gasket, additional parts for proxy type equipment
full_summary:
### Project Parts

#### Solicitation Information

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01014740
* **Solicitation Number:** W8486-238942
* **Publication Date:** November 24, 2022
* The solicitation has **expired**, and the bid deadline was January 16, 2023, at 13:00 hours.

#### Project Overview

The Department of National Defence requires the delivery of various project parts as per the specifications below.

| Item # | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Accumulator, Steering (GSIN: N2530, NSN: 2530-01-1672019) | 2 | Each |
| 2 | Gear Plate Indicator (GSIN: N9905, NSN: 9905-01-1706711) | 4 | Each |
| 3 | Track Assembly (GSIN: N2530, NSN: 2530-21-9201656) | 4 | Each |
| 4 | Switch Push, Headlight (GSIN: N5930, NSN: 5930-01-1714683) | 5 | Each |
| 5 | Fuse, Enclosed (GSIN: N5920, NSN: 5920-01-1656881) | 40 | Each |
| 6 | Metal Ring (GSIN: N5330, NSN: 5330-01-1665936) | 60 | Each |
| 7 | Thermostat (GSIN: N6685, NSN: 6685-21-8983636) | 12 | Each |
| 8 | Gasket, Winch (GSIN: N5330, NSN: 5330-01-1684170) | 4 | Each |

#### Tender Information

* **Classification:** Competitive
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **Contracting Officer:** Joshua Gibbons
* Phone: 819-939-6329
* Email: [Joshua.Gibbons@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Joshua.Gibbons@forces.gc.ca)
